description: All of the Red Wings are sorry to see Riley Sheahan leave but they believe it could end up being a good move for him. message: "First of all, you lose a great teammate, a great guy. Shee has been a big part of this team and obviously when trades happen we know it's part of the business but you can't get away from you're losing a friend, too." - Henrik Zetterberg
